id=\"未完善的使用教程\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#未完善的使用教程\">#</a> 未完善的使用教程</h2>\n<p>那啥？老实说我目前也不是很有条理233333333~</p>\n<h2 id=\"_1、主题下载安装\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_1、主题下载安装\">#</a> 1、主题下载安装</h2>\n<p><a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-theme-sakura<OutboundLink/></a>建议下载压缩包格式，因为除了主题内容还有些source的配置对新手来说比较太麻烦，直接下载解压就省去这些麻烦咯。</p>\n<p>下载好后解压到博客根目录（不是主题目录哦，重复的选择替换）。接着在命令行（cmd、bash）运行<code>npm i</code>安装依赖。</p>\n<h2 id=\"_2、主题配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_2、主题配置\">#</a> 2、主题配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"博客根目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#博客根目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 博客根目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>站点</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># Site</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的站点名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">subtitle</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 站点简介\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">keywords</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">author</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 作者名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">language</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> zh<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>cn\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">timezone</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>部署</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">deploy</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repo</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> \n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的github仓库地址\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: 你的coding仓库地址</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">branch</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> master\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>备份 （使用hexo b发布备份到远程仓库）</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">backup</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">message</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> backup my blog of https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//honjun.github.io/\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repository</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 你的github仓库地址,备份分支名 （建议新建backup分支）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//github.com/honjun/honjun.github.io.git<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span>backup\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: https://git.coding.net/hojun/hojun.git,backup</span>\n\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"主题目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 主题目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>其中标明【改】的是需要修改部门，标明【选】是可改可不改，标明【非】是不用改的部分</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># site name</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点名 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">prefixName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さくら荘その\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">siteName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hojun\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># favicon and site master avatar</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点的favicon和头像 输入图片路径（下面的配置是都是cdn的相对路径，没有cdn请填写完整路径，建议使用jsdeliver搭建一个cdn啦，先去下载我的cdn替换下图片就行了，简单方便~）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">favicon</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /images/favicon.ico\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">avatar</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /img/custom/avatar.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点url 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//sakura.hojun.cn\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点介绍（或者说是个人签名）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Live your life with passion! With some drive!\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点cdn，没有就为空 【改】 若是cdn为空，一些图片地址就要填完整地址了，比如之前avatar就要填https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/custom/avatar.jpg</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">cdn</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 开启pjax 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">pjax</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">1</span>\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点首页的公告信息 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">notice</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hexo<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>Sakura主题已经开源，目前正在开发中<span class=\"token punctuation\">...</span>\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 懒加载的加载中图片 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">lazyloadImg</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/loader/orange.progress<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>bar<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>stripe<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>loader.svg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点菜单配置 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">menus</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">首页</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">path</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>fort<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>awesome faa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>shake <span class=\"token punctuation\">}</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">归档</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">path</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /archives<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>archive faa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>shake<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">submenus</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token /categories/生活/<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>file<span /categories/资源/<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>cloud<span punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>commenting<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>o <span class=\"token punctuation\">}</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">转载</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span><span class=\"token key atrule\">path</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /categories/转载/<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span punctuation\">}</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">}</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">清单</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span> class=\"line-number\">120</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">121</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"分类页和标签页配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页和标签页配置\">#</a> 分类页和标签页配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"分类页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页\">#</a> 分类页</h3>\n<h3 id=\"标签页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#标签页\">#</a> 标签页</h3>\n<p>配置项在\\themes\\Sakura\\languages\\zh-cn.yml里。新增一个分类或标签最好加下哦，当然嫌麻烦可以直接使用一张默认图片（可以改主题或者直接把404图片替换下，征求下意见要不要给这个在配置文件中加个开关，可以issue或群里提出来），现在是没设置的话会使用那种倒立小狗404哦。</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\">#category</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 按分类名创建</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">技术</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\">#中文标题</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">zh</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 野生技术协会 \n <span class=\"token comment\"># 英文标题</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">en</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Geek – Only for Love\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/banner/coding.jpg\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">生活</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">zh</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 生活\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">en</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> live\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/banner/writing.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\">#tag</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 标签名即是标题</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">悦读</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/banner/reading.jpg\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">19</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"单页面封面配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#单页面封面配置\">#</a> 单页面封面配置</h2>\n<p>如留言板页面页面，位于source下的comment下，打开index.md如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code><span class=\"token hr punctuation\">---</span>\ntitle: comment\ndate: 2018-12-20 23:13:48\nkeywords: 留言板\ndescription: \ncomments: true\n<span class=\"token title important\"><span class=\"token punctuation\">#</span> 在这里配置单页面头部图片，自定义替换哦~</span>\n<span class=\"token title important\">photos: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.4/img/banner/comment.jpg\n<span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span></span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">9</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"单页面配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#单页面配置\">#</a> 单页面配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"番组计划页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#番组计划页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\">#</a> 番组计划页 （请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）</h3>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">layout</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> bangumi\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> bangumi\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">comments</span><span punctuation\">:</span> 朝花夕誓——于离别之朝束起约定之花\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 追番状态 （追番ing/已追完）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">status</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 已追完\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 追番进度</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">progress</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">100</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧日文名称</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">jp</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 放送时间</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">time</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">放送时间</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 2018<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>02<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>24 SUN.\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧介绍</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n<span class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">layout</span><span class=\"line-number\">44</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"写文章配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#写文章配置\">#</a> 写文章配置</h2>\n<p>主题集成了个人插件hexo-tag-bili和hexo-tag-fancybox_img。其中hexo-tag-bili用来在文章或单页面中插入B站外链视频，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% bili video_id [page] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-bili/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-bili<OutboundLink/></a>。</p>\n<p>hexo-tag-fancybox_img用来在文章或单页面中图片，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% fb_img src [caption] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-fancybox_img/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-fancybox_img<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<h2 id=\"还有啥，一时想不起来\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#还有啥，一时想不起来\">#</a> 还有啥，一时想不起来......</h2>\n<p>To be href=\"https://github.com/mashirozx/Sakura/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sakura<OutboundLink/></a>修改成Hexo的主题。</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://sakura.hojun.cn\" target=\"_blank\" 交流群</h2>\n<p>若你是使用者，加群QQ: 801511924</p>\n<p>若你是创作者，加群QQ: 194472590</p>\n<h2 id=\"主题特性\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题特性\">#</a> 主题特性</h2>\n<ul>\n<li>首页大屏视频</li>\n<li>首页随机封面</li>\n<li>图片懒加载</li>\n<li>valine评论</li>\n<li>fancy-box相册</li>\n<li>pjax支持，音乐不间断</li>\n<li>aplayer音乐播放器</li>\n<li>多级导航菜单（按现在大部分hexo主题来说，这也算是个特性了）</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"赞赏作者\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#赞赏作者\">#</a> 赞赏作者</h2>\n<p>如果喜欢hexo-theme-sakura主题，可以考虑资助一下哦~非常感激！</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.paypal.me/hojuncn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener id=\"未完善的使用教程\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#未完善的使用教程\">#</a> 未完善的使用教程</h2>\n<p>那啥？老实说我目前也不是很有条理233333333~</p>\n<h2 id=\"_1、主题下载安装\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_1、主题下载安装\">#</a> 1、主题下载安装</h2>\n<p><a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-theme-sakura<OutboundLink/></a>建议下载压缩包格式，因为除了主题内容还有些source的配置对新手来说比较太麻烦，直接下载解压就省去这些麻烦咯。</p>\n<p>下载好后解压到博客根目录（不是主题目录哦，重复的选择替换）。接着在命令行（cmd、bash）运行<code>npm i</code>安装依赖。</p>\n<h2 id=\"_2、主题配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_2、主题配置\">#</a> 2、主题配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"博客根目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#博客根目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 博客根目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>站点</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># Site</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的站点名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">subtitle</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 站点简介\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">keywords</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">author</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 作者名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">language</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> zh<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>cn\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">timezone</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>部署</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">deploy</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repo</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> \n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的github仓库地址\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: 你的coding仓库地址</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">branch</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> master\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>备份 （使用hexo b发布备份到远程仓库）</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">backup</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">message</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> backup my blog of https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//honjun.github.io/\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repository</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 你的github仓库地址,备份分支名 （建议新建backup分支）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//github.com/honjun/honjun.github.io.git<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span>backup\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: https://git.coding.net/hojun/hojun.git,backup</span>\n\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"主题目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 主题目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>其中标明【改】的是需要修改部门，标明【选】是可改可不改，标明【非】是不用改的部分</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># site name</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点名 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">prefixName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さくら荘その\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">siteName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hojun\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># favicon and site master avatar</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点的favicon和头像 输入图片路径（下面的配置是都是cdn的相对路径，没有cdn请填写完整路径，建议使用jsdeliver搭建一个cdn啦，先去下载我的cdn替换下图片就行了，简单方便~）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">favicon</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /images/favicon.ico\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">avatar</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /img/custom/avatar.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点url 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//sakura.hojun.cn\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点介绍（或者说是个人签名）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Live your life with passion! With some drive!\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点cdn，没有就为空 【改】 若是cdn为空，一些图片地址就要填完整地址了，比如之前avatar就要填https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/custom/avatar.jpg</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">cdn</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 开启pjax 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">pjax</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">1</span>\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点首页的公告信息 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">notice</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hexo<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>Sakura主题已经开源，目前正在开发中<span class=\"token punctuation\">...</span>\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 懒加载的加载中图片 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">lazyloadImg</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/loader/orange.progress<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>bar<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>stripe<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>loader.svg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点菜单配置 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">menus</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">首页</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">path</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>fort<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>awesome faa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>shake <span class=\"token punctuation\">}</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">归档</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">path</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /archives<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">fa</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> fa<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>archive faa<span class=\"token class=\"line-number\">120</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">121</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"分类页和标签页配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页和标签页配置\">#</a> 分类页和标签页配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"分类页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页\">#</a> 分类页</h3>\n<h3 id=\"标签页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#标签页\">#</a> 标签页</h3>\n<p>配置项在\\themes\\Sakura\\languages\\zh-cn.yml里。新增一个分类或标签最好加下哦，当然嫌麻烦可以直接使用一张默认图片（可以改主题或者直接把404图片替换下，征求下意见要不要给这个在配置文件中加个开关，可以issue或群里提出来），现在是没设置的话会使用那种倒立小狗404哦。</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\">#category</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 按分类名创建</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">技术</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\">#中文标题</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">zh</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 野生技术协会 \n <span class=\"token comment\"># 英文标题</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">en</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Geek – Only for Love\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/banner/coding.jpg\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">生活</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">zh</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 生活\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">en</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> live\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/banner/writing.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\">#tag</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 标签名即是标题</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">悦读</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/banner/reading.jpg\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">19</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"单页面封面配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#单页面封面配置\">#</a> 单页面封面配置</h2>\n<p>如留言板页面页面，位于source下的comment下，打开index.md如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code><span class=\"token hr punctuation\">---</span>\ntitle: comment\ndate: 2018-12-20 23:13:48\nkeywords: 留言板\ndescription: \ncomments: true\n<span class=\"token title important\"><span class=\"token punctuation\">#</span> 在这里配置单页面头部图片，自定义替换哦~</span>\n<span class=\"token title important\">photos: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.4/img/banner/comment.jpg\n<span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span></span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">9</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"单页面配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#单页面配置\">#</a> 单页面配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"番组计划页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#番组计划页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\">#</a> 番组计划页 （请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）</h3>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">layout</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> bangumi\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> bangumi\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">comments</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token boolean important\">false</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">date</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token datetime number\">2019-02-10 21:32:48</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">keywords</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">bangumis</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番组图片</span>\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//lain.bgm.tv/pic/cover/l/0e/1e/218971_2y351.jpg\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番组名</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 朝花夕誓——于离别之朝束起约定之花\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 追番状态 （追番ing/已追完）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">status</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 已追完\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 追番进度</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">progress</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">100</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧日文名称</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">jp</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 放送时间</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">time</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">放送时间</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 2018<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>02<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>24 SUN.\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧介绍</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//lain.bgm.tv/pic/cover/l/0e/1e/218971_2y351.jpg\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 朝花夕誓——于离别之朝束起约定之花\n <span class=\"token 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n<span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">44</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"写文章配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#写文章配置\">#</a> 写文章配置</h2>\n<p>主题集成了个人插件hexo-tag-bili和hexo-tag-fancybox_img。其中hexo-tag-bili用来在文章或单页面中插入B站外链视频，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% bili video_id [page] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-bili/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-bili<OutboundLink/></a>。</p>\n<p>hexo-tag-fancybox_img用来在文章或单页面中图片，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% fb_img src [caption] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-fancybox_img/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-fancybox_img<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<h2 id=\"还有啥，一时想不起来\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#还有啥，一时想不起来\">#</a> 还有啥，一时想不起来......</h2>\n<p>To be （请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）</a></li></ul></li><li><a href=\"#写文章配置\">写文章配置</a></li><li><a href=\"#还有啥，一时想不起来\">还有啥，一时想不起来......</a></li></ul></div></p>\n</template><p>hexo-theme-sakura主题 <a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura/blob/master/README.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">English document<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<p>基于WordPress主题<a href=\"https://github.com/mashirozx/Sakura/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sakura<OutboundLink/></a>修改成Hexo的主题。</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://sakura.hojun.cn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">demo预览<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<p>正在开发中......</p>\n<p><img src=\"https://desk-fd.zol-img.com.cn/t_s960x600c5/g5/M00/01/0E/ChMkJlbKweiIFY_6AA3VjT9w7FMAALGfwFCj8AADdWl862.jpg\" alt=\"\"></p>\n<h2 id=\"交流群\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#交流群\">#</a> 交流群</h2>\n<p>若你是使用者，加群QQ: 801511924</p>\n<p>若你是创作者，加群QQ: 194472590</p>\n<h2 id=\"主题特性\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题特性\">#</a> 主题特性</h2>\n<ul>\n<li>首页大屏视频</li>\n<li>首页随机封面</li>\n<li>图片懒加载</li>\n<li>valine评论</li>\n<li>fancy-box相册</li>\n<li>pjax支持，音乐不间断</li>\n<li>aplayer音乐播放器</li>\n<li>多级导航菜单（按现在大部分hexo主题来说，这也算是个特性了）</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"赞赏作者\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#赞赏作者\">#</a> 赞赏作者</h2>\n<p>如果喜欢hexo-theme-sakura主题，可以考虑资助一下哦~非常感激！</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.paypal.me/hojuncn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">paypal<OutboundLink/></a> | <a href=\"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/custom/donate/AliPayQR.jpg\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Alipay 支付宝<OutboundLink/></a> | <a href=\"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/custom/donate/WeChanSQ.jpg\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">WeChat Pay 微信支付<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<h2 id=\"未完善的使用教程\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#未完善的使用教程\">#</a> 未完善的使用教程</h2>\n<p>那啥？老实说我目前也不是很有条理233333333~</p>\n<h2 id=\"_1、主题下载安装\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_1、主题下载安装\">#</a> 1、主题下载安装</h2>\n<p><a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-theme-sakura<OutboundLink/></a>建议下载压缩包格式，因为除了主题内容还有些source的配置对新手来说比较太麻烦，直接下载解压就省去这些麻烦咯。</p>\n<p>下载好后解压到博客根目录（不是主题目录哦，重复的选择替换）。接着在命令行（cmd、bash）运行<code>npm i</code>安装依赖。</p>\n<h2 id=\"_2、主题配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_2、主题配置\">#</a> 2、主题配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"博客根目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#博客根目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 博客根目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>站点</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># Site</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的站点名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">subtitle</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 站点简介\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">keywords</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">author</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 作者名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">language</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> zh<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>cn\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">timezone</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>部署</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">deploy</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repo</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> \n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的github仓库地址\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: 你的coding仓库地址</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">branch</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> master\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>备份 （使用hexo b发布备份到远程仓库）</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">backup</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">message</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> backup my blog of https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//honjun.github.io/\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repository</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 你的github仓库地址,备份分支名 （建议新建backup分支）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//github.com/honjun/honjun.github.io.git<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span>backup\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: https://git.coding.net/hojun/hojun.git,backup</span>\n\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"主题目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 主题目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>其中标明【改】的是需要修改部门，标明【选】是可改可不改，标明【非】是不用改的部分</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># site name</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点名 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">prefixName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さくら荘その\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">siteName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hojun\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># favicon and site master avatar</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点的favicon和头像 输入图片路径（下面的配置是都是cdn的相对路径，没有cdn请填写完整路径，建议使用jsdeliver搭建一个cdn啦，先去下载我的cdn替换下图片就行了，简单方便~）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">favicon</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /images/favicon.ico\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">avatar</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /img/custom/avatar.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点url 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//sakura.hojun.cn\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点介绍（或者说是个人签名）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Live your life with passion! With some drive!\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点cdn，没有就为空 【改】 若是cdn为空，一些图片地址就要填完整地址了，比如之前avatar就要填https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6/img/custom/avatar.jpg</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">cdn</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/cdn@1.6\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 开启pjax 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">pjax</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">1</span>\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点首页的公告信息 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">notice</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hexo<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>Sakura主题已经开源，目前正在开发中<span class=\"token punctuation\">...</span>\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 懒加载的加载中图片 【选】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">lazyloadImg</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token 分类页和标签页配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"分类页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页\">#</a> 分类页</h3>\n<h3 id=\"标签页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#标签页\">#</a> 标签页</h3>\n<p>配置项在\\themes\\Sakura\\languages\\zh-cn.yml里。新增一个分类或标签最好加下哦，当然嫌麻烦可以直接使用一张默认图片（可以改主题或者直接把404图片替换下，征求下意见要不要给这个在配置文件中加个开关，可以issue或群里提出来），现在是没设置的话会使用那种倒立小狗404哦。</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\">#category</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 按分类名创建</span>\n<span 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>02<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>24 SUN.\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧介绍</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//lain.bgm.tv/pic/cover/l/0e/1e/218971_2y351.jpg\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 朝花夕誓——于离别之朝束起约定之花\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">status</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 已追完\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">progress</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">50</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">jp</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">time</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">放送时间</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 2018<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>02<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>24 SUN.\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n<span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">9</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">10</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">11</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">12</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">13</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">14</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">15</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">16</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">17</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">18</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">19</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">24</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">25</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">26</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">27</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">28</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">29</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">30</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"友链页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#友链页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\">#</a> 友链页 （请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）</h3>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">layout</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> links\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> links\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 创建日期，可以改下</span>\n<span class=\"line-number\">44</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"写文章配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#写文章配置\">#</a> 写文章配置</h2>\n<p>主题集成了个人插件hexo-tag-bili和hexo-tag-fancybox_img。其中hexo-tag-bili用来在文章或单页面中插入B站外链视频，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% bili video_id [page] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-bili/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-bili<OutboundLink/></a>。</p>\n<p>hexo-tag-fancybox_img用来在文章或单页面中图片，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% fb_img src [caption] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-fancybox_img/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura/blob/master/README.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">English document<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<p>基于WordPress主题<a href=\"https://github.com/mashirozx/Sakura/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sakura<OutboundLink/></a>修改成Hexo的主题。</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://sakura.hojun.cn\" target=\"_blank\" 交流群</h2>\n<p>若你是使用者，加群QQ: 801511924</p>\n<p>若你是创作者，加群QQ: 194472590</p>\n<h2 id=\"主题特性\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题特性\">#</a> 主题特性</h2>\n<ul>\n<li>首页大屏视频</li>\n<li>首页随机封面</li>\n<li>图片懒加载</li>\n<li>valine评论</li>\n<li>fancy-box相册</li>\n<li>pjax支持，音乐不间断</li>\n<li>aplayer音乐播放器</li>\n<li>多级导航菜单（按现在大部分hexo主题来说，这也算是个特性了）</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"赞赏作者\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#赞赏作者\">#</a> 赞赏作者</h2>\n<p>如果喜欢hexo-theme-sakura主题，可以考虑资助一下哦~非常感激！</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.paypal.me/hojuncn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener id=\"未完善的使用教程\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#未完善的使用教程\">#</a> 未完善的使用教程</h2>\n<p>那啥？老实说我目前也不是很有条理233333333~</p>\n<h2 id=\"_1、主题下载安装\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_1、主题下载安装\">#</a> 1、主题下载安装</h2>\n<p><a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-theme-sakura<OutboundLink/></a>建议下载压缩包格式，因为除了主题内容还有些source的配置对新手来说比较太麻烦，直接下载解压就省去这些麻烦咯。</p>\n<p>下载好后解压到博客根目录（不是主题目录哦，重复的选择替换）。接着在命令行（cmd、bash）运行<code>npm i</code>安装依赖。</p>\n<h2 id=\"_2、主题配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_2、主题配置\">#</a> 2、主题配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"博客根目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#博客根目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 博客根目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>站点</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-java line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-java\"><code><span class=\"token keyword\">public</span> <span class=\"token keyword\">static</span> <span class=\"token keyword\">void</span> <span class=\"token function\">main</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">(</span><span class=\"token class-name\">String</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">[</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">]</span> args<span class=\"token punctuation\">)</span> <span class=\"token punctuation\">{</span>\n <span class=\"token class-name\">System</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">.</span>out<span class=\"token punctuation\">.</span><span class=\"token function\">println</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">(</span><span class=\"token string\">\"Hello World\"</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">)</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">;</span>\n<span class=\"token punctuation\">}</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"主题目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 主题目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>其中标明【改】的是需要修改部门，标明【选】是可改可不改，标明【非】是不用改的部分</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># site name</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点名 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">prefixName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さくら荘その\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">siteName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hojun\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># favicon and site master avatar</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点的favicon和头像 输入图片路径（下面的配置是都是cdn的相对路径，没有cdn请填写完整路径，建议使用jsdeliver搭建一个cdn啦，先去下载我的cdn替换下图片就行了，简单方便~）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">favicon</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /images/favicon.ico\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">avatar</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /img/custom/avatar.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点url 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">donate</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">alipay</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> atrule\">wechatSQ</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /img/custom/donate/WeChanSQ.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 首页视频地址为https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/hojun@1.2/Unbroken.mp4，配置如下 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">movies</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/hojun@1.2\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 多个视频用逗号隔开，随机获取。支持的格式目前已知MP4,Flv。其他的可以试下，不保证有用</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">name</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Unbroken.mp4\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 左下角aplayer播放器配置 主要改id和server这两项，修改详见[aplayer文档] 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">aplayer</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> \n <span class=\"token key atrule\">id</span><span class=\"line-number\">120</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">121</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"分类页和标签页配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页和标签页配置\">#</a> 分类页和标签页配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"分类页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页\">#</a> 分类页</h3>\n<h3 id=\"标签页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#标签页\">#</a> 标签页</h3>\n<p>配置项在\\themes\\Sakura\\languages\\zh-cn.yml里。新增一个分类或标签最好加下哦，当然嫌麻烦可以直接使用一张默认图片（可以改主题或者直接把404图片替换下，征求下意见要不要给这个在配置文件中加个开关，可以issue或群里提出来），现在是没设置的话会使用那种倒立小狗404哦。</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\">#category</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 按分类名创建</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">技术</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\">#中文标题</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">zh</span><span class=\"token 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token 单页面封面配置</h2>\n<p>如留言板页面页面，位于source下的comment下，打开index.md如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">9</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"单页面配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#单页面配置\">#</a> 单页面配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"番组计划页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#番组计划页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\">#</a> 番组计划页 （请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）</h3>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">layout</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> bangumi\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> bangumi\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">comments</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token boolean important\">false</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">date</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token datetime number\">2019-02-10 21:32:48</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">keywords</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">bangumis</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番组图片</span>\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 朝花夕誓——于离别之朝束起约定之花\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 追番状态 （追番ing/已追完）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">status</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 已追完\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 追番进度</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">progress</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">100</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧日文名称</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">jp</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 放送时间</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">time</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">放送时间</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 2018<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>02<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>24 SUN.\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 番剧介绍</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//lain.bgm.tv/pic/cover/l/0e/1e/218971_2y351.jpg\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 朝花夕誓——于离别之朝束起约定之花\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">status</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 已追完\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">progress</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">50</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">jp</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">time</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">放送时间</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 2018<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>02<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>24 SUN.\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n<span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">9</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">10</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">11</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">12</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">13</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">14</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">15</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">16</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">17</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">18</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">19</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">20</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">21</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">22</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">23</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">24</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">25</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">26</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">27</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">28</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">29</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">30</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"友链页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#友链页-（请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）\">#</a> 友链页 （请直接在下载后的文件中改，下面的添加了注释可能会有些影响）</h3>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token punctuation\">---</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">layout</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> links\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> links\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 创建日期，可以改下</span>\n<span 写文章配置</h2>\n<p>主题集成了个人插件hexo-tag-bili和hexo-tag-fancybox_img。其中hexo-tag-bili用来在文章或单页面中插入B站外链视频，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% bili video_id [page] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-bili/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-bili<OutboundLink/></a>。</p>\n<p>hexo-tag-fancybox_img用来在文章或单页面中图片，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% fb_img src [caption] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-fancybox_img/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://github.com/mashirozx/Sakura/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sakura<OutboundLink/></a>修改成Hexo的主题。</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://sakura.hojun.cn\" target=\"_blank\" 交流群</h2>\n<p>若你是使用者，加群QQ: 801511924</p>\n<p>若你是创作者，加群QQ: 194472590</p>\n<h2 id=\"主题特性\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题特性\">#</a> 主题特性</h2>\n<ul>\n<li>首页大屏视频</li>\n<li>首页随机封面</li>\n<li>图片懒加载</li>\n<li>valine评论</li>\n<li>fancy-box相册</li>\n<li>pjax支持，音乐不间断</li>\n<li>aplayer音乐播放器</li>\n<li>多级导航菜单（按现在大部分hexo主题来说，这也算是个特性了）</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"赞赏作者\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#赞赏作者\">#</a> 赞赏作者</h2>\n<p>如果喜欢hexo-theme-sakura主题，可以考虑资助一下哦~非常感激！</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.paypal.me/hojuncn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener id=\"未完善的使用教程\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#未完善的使用教程\">#</a> 未完善的使用教程</h2>\n<p>那啥？老实说我目前也不是很有条理233333333~</p>\n<h2 id=\"_1、主题下载安装\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_1、主题下载安装\">#</a> 1、主题下载安装</h2>\n<p><a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-theme-sakura<OutboundLink/></a>建议下载压缩包格式，因为除了主题内容还有些source的配置对新手来说比较太麻烦，直接下载解压就省去这些麻烦咯。</p>\n<p>下载好后解压到博客根目录（不是主题目录哦，重复的选择替换）。接着在命令行（cmd、bash）运行<code>npm i</code>安装依赖。</p>\n<h2 id=\"_2、主题配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#_2、主题配置\">#</a> 2、主题配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"博客根目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#博客根目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 博客根目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>站点</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># Site</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">title</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的站点名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">subtitle</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">description</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 站点简介\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">keywords</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">author</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 作者名\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">language</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> zh<span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span>cn\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">timezone</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>部署</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">deploy</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repo</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> \n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 你的github仓库地址\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: 你的coding仓库地址</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">branch</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> master\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>备份 （使用hexo b发布备份到远程仓库）</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token key atrule\">backup</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> git\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">message</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> backup my blog of https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//honjun.github.io/\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">repository</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 你的github仓库地址,备份分支名 （建议新建backup分支）</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">github</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//github.com/honjun/honjun.github.io.git<span class=\"token punctuation\">,</span>backup\n <span class=\"token comment\"># coding: https://git.coding.net/hojun/hojun.git,backup</span>\n\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">2</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">3</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">4</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">5</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">6</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">7</span><br><span class=\"line-number\">8</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h3 id=\"主题目录下的-config配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题目录下的-config配置\">#</a> 主题目录下的_config配置</h3>\n<p>其中标明【改】的是需要修改部门，标明【选】是可改可不改，标明【非】是不用改的部分</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\"># site name</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点名 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">prefixName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> さくら荘その\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">siteName</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> hojun\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># favicon and site master avatar</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点的favicon和头像 输入图片路径（下面的配置是都是cdn的相对路径，没有cdn请填写完整路径，建议使用jsdeliver搭建一个cdn啦，先去下载我的cdn替换下图片就行了，简单方便~）【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">favicon</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /images/favicon.ico\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">avatar</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> /img/custom/avatar.jpg\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 站点url 【改】</span>\n<span 首页视频地址为https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/hojun@1.2/Unbroken.mp4，配置如下 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">movies</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/honjun/hojun@1.2\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 多个视频用逗号隔开，随机获取。支持的格式目前已知MP4,Flv。其他的可以试下，不保证有用</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">name</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Unbroken.mp4\n\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 左下角aplayer播放器配置 主要改id和server这两项，修改详见[aplayer文档] 【改】</span>\n<span class=\"token key atrule\">aplayer</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> \n <span class=\"token key atrule\">id</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token number\">2660651585</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">server</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> netease\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">type</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> playlist\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">fixed</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token boolean important\">true</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">mini</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> <span class=\"token boolean important\">false</span>\n <span class=\"token key 分类页和标签页配置</h2>\n<h3 id=\"分类页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#分类页\">#</a> 分类页</h3>\n<h3 id=\"标签页\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#标签页\">#</a> 标签页</h3>\n<p>配置项在\\themes\\Sakura\\languages\\zh-cn.yml里。新增一个分类或标签最好加下哦，当然嫌麻烦可以直接使用一张默认图片（可以改主题或者直接把404图片替换下，征求下意见要不要给这个在配置文件中加个开关，可以issue或群里提出来），现在是没设置的话会使用那种倒立小狗404哦。</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-yml line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-yml\"><code><span class=\"token comment\">#category</span>\n<span class=\"token comment\"># 按分类名创建</span>\n<span 封面图片</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token 单页面封面配置</h2>\n<p>如留言板页面页面，位于source下的comment下，打开index.md如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code><span punctuation\">:</span> 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token 住在远离尘嚣的土地，一边将每天的事情编织成名为希比欧的布，一边静静生活的伊欧夫人民。在15岁左右外表就停止成长，拥有数百年寿命的他们，被称为“离别的一族”，并被视为活着的传说。没有双亲的伊欧夫少女玛奇亚，过着被伙伴包围的平稳日子，却总感觉“孤身一人”。他们的这种日常，一瞬间就崩溃消失。追求伊欧夫的长寿之血，梅萨蒂军乘坐着名为雷纳特的古代兽发动了进攻。在绝望与混乱之中，伊欧夫的第一美女蕾莉亚被梅萨蒂带走，而玛奇亚暗恋的少年克里姆也失踪了。玛奇亚虽然总算逃脱了，却失去了伙伴和归去之地……。\n<span punctuation\">:</span>//cloud.moezx.cc/Picture/svg/landscape/fields.svg\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 友链站点名</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">name</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Google\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 友链介绍 下面雷同</span>\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Google 镜像\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//shino.cc/fgvf\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cloud.moezx.cc/Picture/svg/landscape/fields.svg\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">name</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Google\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Google 镜像\n <span class=\"token comment\"># 类型分组...</span>\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">group</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 小伙伴们\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> 欢迎交换友链 ꉂ(ˊᗜˋ)\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">items</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//shino.cc/fgvf\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">img</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//cloud.moezx.cc/Picture/svg/landscape/fields.svg\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">name</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Google\n <span class=\"token key atrule\">desc</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> Google 镜像\n <span class=\"token punctuation\">-</span> <span class=\"token key atrule\">url</span><span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span> https<span class=\"token punctuation\">:</span>//shino.cc/fgvf\n <span class=\"token key class=\"line-number\">44</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><h2 id=\"写文章配置\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#写文章配置\">#</a> 写文章配置</h2>\n<p>主题集成了个人插件hexo-tag-bili和hexo-tag-fancybox_img。其中hexo-tag-bili用来在文章或单页面中插入B站外链视频，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% bili video_id [page] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-bili/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-bili<OutboundLink/></a>。</p>\n<p>hexo-tag-fancybox_img用来在文章或单页面中图片，使用语法如下：</p>\n<!--beforebegin--><div class=\"language-md line-numbers-mode\"><!--afterbegin--><pre v-pre class=\"language-md\"><code>{% fb_img src [caption] %}\n</code></pre>\n<div class=\"line-numbers-wrapper\"><span class=\"line-number\">1</span><br></div><!--beforeend--></div><!--afterend--><p>详细使用教程详见<a href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-tag-fancybox_img/blob/master/README-zh_cn.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">hexo-tag-fancybox_img<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<h2 id=\"还有啥，一时想不起来\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#还有啥，一时想不起来\">#</a> 还有啥，一时想不起来......</h2>\n<p>To be href=\"https://github.com/honjun/hexo-theme-sakura/blob/master/README.md\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">English document<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<p>基于WordPress主题<a href=\"https://github.com/mashirozx/Sakura/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sakura<OutboundLink/></a>修改成Hexo的主题。</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://sakura.hojun.cn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">demo预览<OutboundLink/></a></p>\n<p>正在开发中......</p>\n<p><img src=\"https://desk-fd.zol-img.com.cn/t_s960x600c5/g5/M00/01/0E/ChMkJlbKweiIFY_6AA3VjT9w7FMAALGfwFCj8AADdWl862.jpg\" alt=\"\"></p>\n<h2 id=\"交流群\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#交流群\">#</a> 交流群</h2>\n<p>若你是使用者，加群QQ: 801511924</p>\n<p>若你是创作者，加群QQ: 194472590</p>\n<h2 id=\"主题特性\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#主题特性\">#</a> 主题特性</h2>\n<ul>\n<li>首页大屏视频</li>\n<li>首页随机封面</li>\n<li>图片懒加载</li>\n<li>valine评论</li>\n<li>fancy-box相册</li>\n<li>pjax支持，音乐不间断</li>\n<li>aplayer音乐播放器</li>\n<li>多级导航菜单（按现在大部分hexo主题来说，这也算是个特性了）</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"赞赏作者\"><a class=\"header-anchor\" href=\"#赞赏作者\">#</a> 赞赏作者</h2>\n<p>如果喜欢hexo-theme-sakura主题，可以考虑资助一下哦~非常感激！</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.paypal.me/hojuncn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener
